content: the crochet tea cosy pattern is designed with crochet beginners in mind and uses only basic crochet stitches the pattern is written for 3 standard size teapots - 2 cup - 6 cup - 10 cup the video tutorial takes you through step by step how to make your own crochet tea cosy and also shows you how to adjust the pattern to fit your own teapot the only thing better than a cup of tea has to be a cup poured from a teapot wrapped in a handmade cosy ***pattern details*** - uk terms and us terms - file type 2 x pdf with links to youtube tutorials - page size a4 210mm x 297mm - language english - download will include 1 x colour pdf in uk terms and 1 x colour pdf in us terms ***finished size*** 3 sizes - 10 cup tea pot measuring 10 tall and 11 wide - 6 cup tea pot measuring 7 tall and 7 5 wide - 2 cup tea pot measuring 5 5 tall and 6 ***materials needed*** 60-130mchunky bulky yarn in 1 or more colours i used paintbox yarns simply chunky 100% acrylic 100g 136m/149yds in various shades 6mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle for chunky yarn small button for close this pattern has been fully tested and edited to ensure it s easy to read follow and complete your project if you need any support to complete your crochet project please get in touch don t forget to follow and tag me on social media facebook www facebook com/cosyrosieuk instagram @cosyrosieuk www cosyrosieuk com ***important*** - i do not accept returns or refunds - please do not copy or claim as your own - you may sell physical product versions of these however please credit me as the designer - please do not sell the pdf - if you have any questions please contact me via the contact option on my page or pop me an email at fiona@cosyrosieuk co uk all design and photos are copyright of cosy rosie uk fiona field © 2023 all patterns are a digital download pdf file these are non-refundable but i am happy to assist you with pattern support if you have any problems completing your project
